idea:
Caregiver Saathi 

Caregiver Saathi: Companions for Caregivers

Caregiver Saathi is an endeavour to acknowledge and support Caregivers of patients with terminal illness or chronic conditions, so that together we can improve the quality of their lives, their well-being and those that they care for.

Caregiving to a dear one is who is facing terminal illness or a chronic condition is a uniquely challenging and often a traumatic journey for the primary caregiver. As the Caregiver's well-being is pivotal for the well-being and healing of the patient / care-receiver, we aim to be a one-stop solutions provider for a caregiver and to build an ecosystem that empowers them, and enables their well-being.

We partner with doctors, health practitioners, employers and well-wishers of caregivers to build a supportive community for the caregivers. In order to service these needs and build this ecosystem, we use digital / online systems, offline in-person workshops and one-on-one interactions.

Our app Caregiver Saathi which has been designed to help caregivers manage their role and time, in order to create well-being for themselves. The app is currently on Playstore, iOS version is due shortly.

https://play.google.com/store/apps/details?id=com.caregiversaathi&hl=en_IN


Our Advisory Board

Our advisory board is a team of deeply empathetic and accomplished individuals who are passionate about social impact and the cause of caregiving. They have been pioneers in their areas of expertise which range across medicine, palliative care, yoga therapy, social innovation, behavioural science, process work, research, design, business strategy, organization development, besides being caregivers or carers of caregivers themselves.  

https://caregiversaathi.co.in/about-us
